english.segment1: In You I will find my peace. In You I will find my strength. Youre the one that lifts my head. I will not be ashamed.. ashamed.
english.segment2: All I have is in You, all I need is from You. Lift up my eyes. You have put the joy thats in my heart. Lift up my voice. For in You is where I find hope. Lift up my eyes. You have put the joy thats in my heart. Lift up my voice. For in You is where I find hope.
english.segment3: Let them ever sing for joy, and may you shelter them, that those who love Your name may exalt in You.. You.. in You.
english.segment4: Youre wonderful. Im powerless in Your arms. Youve shown me love in the surrounds of hate, and restored my strength, and I proclaim my life is Yours. So break my will, and surely not in vain. I keep my life pure for great is my reward.
